Break [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
Abilities of creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them cost {1} less to activate.
[i]Topple[/i] - {4}{G}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Double this creature’s power and toughness until end of turn.
